alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 9:19PM CDT until March 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harrison County in southern Mississippi... Northeastern Hancock County in southern Mississippi... Northwestern Jackson County in southern Mississippi... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 919 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kiln, or near Diamondhead, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, St. Martin, Diamondhead, D`iberville, Latimer, Kiln, Lyman, Gulf Hills, Vancleave, Hickory Hills, Saucier and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 11 and 59. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 2 and 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
